page.title: 10THE OLDEST CHURCH
page.content: The oldest church in the area is situated in the village of Llanwnda. It is a bellcote church. This church has existed since early Christian times. The following denominations are represented in Fishguard and Goodwick: Baptist; Congregational; Methodist, Church in Wales; Roman Catholic. There is a Roman Catholic Primary School in Fishguard and also a Convent of the Sisters of Mercy. There is also a residential home for the elderly attached to the Convent and administered by the Sisters of Mercy.
